title: Black music in America: the 70's
creator_credit: BMA and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: An overview of the world of black music in the 1970’s. Presents a musical journey from Motown to disco of Donna Summer. Includes clips of over seventy-five groups showing the growth and influence of black music in this decade. Narrators are Isaac Hayes and Dionne Warwick. Suitable for upper secondary level.
